mapper.select: SELECT A.SETTLEMENT_NO , A.SETTLEMENT_START_DATE , A.SETTLEMENT_END_DATE , A.TOTAL_SALES , A.COMMISSION_BY_SALES , A.SETTLEMENT_AMT , A.SETTLEMENT_DATE , A.SETTLEMENT_CHK FROM TBL_SETTLEMENT A WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0002' ORDER BY A.SETTLEMENT_NO DESC
SELECT MAX(A.SETTLEMENT_END_DATE) AS LAST_END_DATE FROM TBL_SETTLEMENT A WHERE A.CORP_NO = 'CORP0002'
